climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: Contains: (2) 32 Ounce 100% Recycled Plastic Bottles of Everyone 3in1 Coconut and Lemon Soap. For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. New Look, Same Great Product

Scent: Everyone 3in1 Coconut Lemon Soap combines the upbeat burst of lemon with the tropical relaxation of sweet coconut for a blend that will make you feel like you're on a tropical vacation. You’ll feel more energized, positive, and ready to seize the day

Use: Our 3in1 Soap is a do-it-all cleanser that will give you a refresh from head to toe. Whether as a body wash, shampoo, or bubble bath, the aromatic brightness of lemon and the calming sweetness of coconut will engage your senses while gently nourishing your hair and skin
Clean Promise: Everyone 3in1 Soap is EWG verified, GMO free, cruelty free, gluten free, triclosan free, and synthetic fragrance free
Zero Waste Mission: In 2019, we diverted 90% of our waste from landfills. Our packaging is made from recycled material. We always use 100% recyclable packaging for order shipping, too
body.description: This is not your average soap. Everyone 3 in 1 Soaps combine gentle coconut cleansers, organic plant extracts, and vitamins E and B5 to nourish skin and hair while cleansing it of the day’s dirt and impurities. We know life gets crazy, that’s why our convenient 3-in-1 soaps work great as a shampoo, body wash, bubble bath, and even shave gel for a simplified routine. Plus, less bottles mean less plastic. At EO Products, we believe the best resources come from nature. That is why we are committed to our zero-waste mission. Our products are always made with reduction and repurposing in mind, this includes our recyclable packaging. Since 1995, we've made our products from domestic and imported ingredients in our family-owned and -operated factory in San Rafael, California. We learned early on that the only way to meet our own high standards was to take responsibility for everything ourselves. From our family to yours, enjoy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: #EveryoneCares Everyone has been putting the care into body care products since 2012. We believe that all families deserve the best for their bodies, that's why we use plant-based ingredients. Prioritizing People + Planet We say YEP to botanical extracts and pure essential oils, and NOPE to animal testing, synthetic fragrances, parabens, dyes and phthalates. 100% Recycled Bottle Our bottles are now made from previously-used recycled plastic, with a dark amber color that keeps UV rays away from the natural ingredients inside.
Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS SOAP
reviews.reviewText: This scent is everything! (Lemon coconut). The scent is so nice and refreshing, seriously I love it. I've used citrus scented and coconut milk soaps before, but this combo is just awesome and uniquely different and amazing. Besides the scent: this is a great price for the amount! Especially considering all the AMAZING benefits. Its hard to find inexpensive sulfate-free soap, hard to find inexpensive cruelty-free soap, hard to find gluten free and GMO free soaps (I don't really care as much about those last 2 but at least you know it really is natural!). This is all those things and a reasonable price. The soap is not thick and creamy - it is thin in a nice way (and not oily but feels moisturizing), and I personally think a little goes a long way. Some reviewers said they needed a lot for shampoo... I don't agree. I have long hair (although kind of thin) and I have no problem, but I guess that is relative. I always use sulfate-free shampoos and the fact that they are sulfate-free, by design, automatically means they lather less so you need to kind of expect that. You don't need a thick lather to get clean-it just makes people feel cleaner when its all sudsy. That being said I do think it lathers pretty well though!! You can definitely get a little suds out of it. Seriously never thought I would write such a long review for soap, but this soap is the best and perfect balance of everything! I am going to look into Everyone's other products. Pretty sure this is made in America too, so another bonus and another reason to be amazed at the price. I don't think I will ever use another soap again. Also, haven't tried the bubble bath but I bet it will work awesome because of its consistency. Can't wait to try it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gluten free and smells nice
reviews.reviewText: Only body wash I use. Works great, smells nice, not overpowering, gluten free, a must for me. Good value, don't have to use a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Soap I've used
reviews.reviewText: We only use this soap. It's safe for my toddler, who likes to drink the bathwater. Cleans well, smells great, and a bargain if you get the subscription.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Liquid Soap
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for ways to detox my life and originally tried it because it was EWG verified. I love the way this soap smells and I love the way my skins feels after using it. I am 52 years old and have always had extremely dry skin. I will always need to use a moisturizer, but on the rare occasion that I do not use one after showering with this product, my skin never feels tight or stripped. My skin feels softer than it ever has when I follow with the coconut lemon body lotion. I have used both the soap and lotion on my face as well. I am trying to reduce the amount of plastic I use, so I do use an EWG verified bar soap most of the time now for bathing. I do still use and love the lavender liquid hand soap, however. I gifted my son with a bottle of the coconut lemon body wash for Christmas last year and he will not use anything else now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price and product
reviews.reviewText: It is good, but there is not much foam when washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: I like having a "3-in-1", very handy since my wife has about 10 different bottles in our shower.......Smells great and is very refreshing. One more thing......My chiropractor gave out a website that rates personal products based on how much iffy, and downright nasty stuff they contain. This product rated very high on their list of acceptable products........5 out of 5 stars on that site also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good value
reviews.reviewText: wonderful scent. Good all around soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans great and gentle on the skin

reviews.reviewText: Great product, no toxic perfume smell, lathers nice. Great as a shampoo and also body wash.

reviews.reviewTitle: Suaviza la piel y limpia eficazmente
reviews.reviewText: Deja una sensación de limpieza y frescura. También actúa cómo suavizante de la piel controlando el exceso de grasa, aunque no es en sí un humectante eficaz. Incluso en los pies ayuda —por lo que pude darme cuenta— a sanar pequeñas heridas entre los dedos (seguramente por pie de Atleta). El aroma es agradable. Recomendable en verdad.
It is super convenient to have this combination product. It is very reasonably priced and works extremely well.
Me gustó mucho, estaba buscando un jabón que fuera libre de químicos tóxicos para la piel, tiene poco olor ya que no tiene fragancias artificiales, solo aceites esenciales, lo seguiré comprando.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this stuff. Great value, beautiful natural scent.
reviews.reviewText: It's amazing to me that I can get these huge bottles of all natural shampoo for such a great price (here or in other in-person locations) - but to also be able to use it for hand-washing and as a body wash is so convenient. One caveat: They were shipped wrapped in plastic, which is great, but that didn't prevent one of the bottles from leaking all over the bottom of the box. It's as if someone squeezed the pump twice during the packing process. the other bottle was fine. So don't order anything with it that could be damaged by getting wet. I still give it 5 stars because it's the product I'm rating, which is excellent.
